mapper.insert: insert into scientific_task(`scientific_id`,scientific_leader_id, `number`, `name`, create_date, creator) values(#{map.projectId}, #{map.scientifidLeaderId}, #{map.number}, #{map.name}, now(), #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT p.number, l.id, IFNULL( t.have, 0 ) - IFNULL( w.used, 0 ) AS surplus, t.have, IFNULL( w.used, 0 ) AS used FROM scientific_project p, `scientific_leader` l, ( SELECT scientific_leader_id, SUM( workday ) AS have FROM `scientific_term` GROUP BY scientific_leader_id ) AS t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.scientific_leader_id, SUM( workday ) AS used FROM scientific_task_workday w, scientific_task t WHERE w.scientific_task_id = t.id GROUP BY t.scientific_leader_id ) AS w ON t.scientific_leader_id = w.scientific_leader_id WHERE l.scientific_id = #{id} AND l.leader = #{userId} AND p.id = l.scientific_id AND l.id = t.scientific_leader_id

SELECT id, taskId, number, `name`, creator, userName, workday, createDate, checkRole, submit FROM ( SELECT w.id, t.id AS taskId, t.number, t.`name`, u.`name` AS creator, u1.`name` AS userName, w.workday, cast( t.create_date AS CHAR ( 19 )) AS createDate, t.creator = #{userId} AS checkRole, submit FROM scientific_project p, scientific_task t, scientific_task_workday w, `user` u, `user` u1 WHERE p.id = #{id} AND p.generalId = #{userId} AND t.scientific_id = p.id AND w.scientific_task_id = t.id AND t.creator = u.id AND w.user_id = u1.id UNION SELECT w.id, t.id AS taskId, t.number, t.`name`, u.`name` AS creator, u1.`name` AS userName, w.workday, cast( t.create_date AS CHAR ( 19 )) AS createDate, t.creator = #{userId} AS checkRole, submit FROM scientific_project p, scientific_task t, scientific_task_workday w, `user` u, `user` u1 WHERE p.id = #{id} AND t.creator = #{userId} AND t.scientific_id = p.id AND w.scientific_task_id = t.id AND t.creator = u.id AND w.user_id = u1.id ) AS tab GROUP BY id

SELECT t.number, t.`name`, w.submit, CASE w.submit WHEN 2 THEN "已发放" WHEN 1 THEN "已申报" WHEN 3 THEN "被回退" ELSE "未申报" END AS submitState, w.submit_date, u.`name`, w.workday FROM scientific_leader l, scientific_task t, scientific_task_workday w, `user` u WHERE l.scientific_id = #{map.id} AND l.leader = #{userId} AND t.scientific_leader_id = l.id AND w.scientific_task_id = t.id AND w.submit_date = #{map.date} AND w.user_id = u.id
